title: web.get Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing the result of an HTTP or HTTPS GET request to an external endpoint.

body.description: The JSON response body from the external service, if any. The maximum response size from the service is 8192 bytes.

payload.description: A base64-encoded binary payload from the external service, if any. The maximum response size from the service is 8192 bytes.

length.description: The length of the returned binary payload (in bytes).

cobs.description: The size of the COBS-encoded data (in bytes).

samples.description: Response body from HTTP GET request to the external service.
